title: My Life As
synopsis: It's been six months since Yasunari ran away from home. He is saved from the streets by Fumi and Rino (Aurora Snow), and ends up living with them as their pet. Along with his friend Chie (Britttany Andrews), he is introduced to a new world of S & M, and group sex. He publishes his new sexual experience in a magazine, which ends up in the hands of his brother, Tomoyasu.
